description: Extension pack for VCs focused on deep technology, hard science, and frontier tech investments

additional_nodes.label: Technical Risk Tolerance
additional_nodes.description: How much science/technology risk is acceptable before product-market fit

additional_nodes.label: Time to Commercialization
additional_nodes.description: Maximum acceptable timeline from investment to commercial revenue

additional_nodes.label: IP Evaluation Depth
additional_nodes.description: How deeply patents and IP defensibility are evaluated

additional_nodes.label: Team Pedigree Requirements
additional_nodes.description: Academic or industry background requirements for founders

additional_nodes.label: Capital Intensity Tolerance
additional_nodes.description: Comfort level with high follow-on capital requirements

additional_nodes.label: Technical Diligence Approach
additional_nodes.description: How technical due diligence is conducted

additional_nodes.label: Government Grants View
additional_nodes.description: View on companies funded by government grants vs VC

additional_nodes.label: Academic Spinout Preference
additional_nodes.description: Preference for or against university spinouts

question_templates.template: How do you evaluate technical risk vs market risk? What's the right balance for your fund?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: Would you invest in something that has scientific risk - where we're not sure it can be built?

question_templates.template: At what point does 'too much science' become a concern for you?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: What's an example of a technology that crossed the line for you?

question_templates.template: What's the longest time-to-commercialization you'd be comfortable investing in?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: Would you invest in a 7-year path to revenue if the outcome was big enough?

question_templates.template: How do you think about fund lifecycle constraints when evaluating long-horizon deeptech?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: Does your LP base allow for longer hold periods?

question_templates.template: How do you evaluate IP defensibility in deeptech? Do you bring in patent attorneys?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: What makes a patent portfolio strong vs. weak in your view?

question_templates.template: How important is founder's PhD or academic pedigree in deeptech investments?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: Would you back an industry person over an academic for the same technology?

question_templates.template: What's the ideal founder combination for a deeptech company - scientist-CEO or scientist-CTO with business co-founder?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: How do you help technical founders build the business side?

question_templates.template: How do you think about capital intensity? What total capital-to-exit is acceptable?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: At what point does the capital required make an opportunity not venture-backable?

question_templates.template: How do you evaluate the follow-on financing risk for capital-intensive deeptech?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: Do you consider strategic investor interest as part of your thesis?

question_templates.template: What does technical diligence look like for you? Do you have in-house experts or use advisors?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: How do you get comfortable with technology you don't fully understand?

question_templates.template: How do you view companies that have been funded primarily by government grants?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: Is grant funding a signal of validation or a red flag for commercialization?

question_templates.template: What's your experience with university spinouts? Do you actively seek them out?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: How do you navigate university IP and licensing agreements?

question_templates.template: What makes a good vs. bad technology transfer office to work with?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: Have you had any difficult experiences with university negotiations?

question_templates.template: How do you assess market timing for emerging technologies? What signals do you look for?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: Have you ever been too early on a deeptech investment?

question_templates.template: What exit paths do you typically see for deeptech companies? M&A vs IPO?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: Who are the typical acquirers in your portfolio's sectors?
